mapper.select: SELECT pf_order, pf_id, artist_id, category_id, pf_date, pf_name, pf_price, pf_time, pf_status, CONCAT('/resources/images/', thumb) as thumb, ticket_date FROM performance ORDER BY pf_order ASC

SELECT pf_order, pf_id, artist_id, category_id, pf_date, pf_name, pf_price, pf_time, pf_status, CONCAT('/resources/images/', thumb) as thumb, ticket_date, REPLACE(LEFT(ticket_date,10), '.', '-') as t_date, CONCAT(LEFT(pf_name, 12), '···') as name FROM performance WHERE pf_status = 0 ORDER BY t_date ASC
